name: TableStyleMappings
shortdesc: A collection of table style mappings.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new TableStyleMapping

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the TableStyleMapping.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the TableStyleMapping with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the TableStyleMappings within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The TableStyleMapping, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: TableStyleMapping, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The TableStyleMapping, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: TableStyleMapping, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first TableStyleMapping in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last TableStyleMapping in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle TableStyleMapping in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the TableStyleMapping with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the TableStyleMapping that follows the desired TableStyleMapping.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the TableStyleMapping whose index follows the specified TableStyleMapping in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The TableStyleMapping whose index comes before the desired TableStyleMapping.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any TableStyleMapping in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every TableStyleMapping in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TableStyleMapping.
Returns the TableStyleMapping with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
